text: Jana'i diya, ‘he mora mumina bandasakala! Tomaloke nija pratipalakara takbaraa aralambana karaa. Yisakale e'i parthira jiranata kalyanakara kama karae te'omlokara babe ache kalyana. Allahara prthirai bisala prasasta, kerala dhairyasilasakalake'i te'omlokara pratidana aganitabharae purnaraupe pradana karaa ha’ba’
